title: Hikking
text: We will take our hike to the refuge in the Ortles Cevedale mountains, an absolute mecca for outdoor enthusiast, with expert alpine guides.

title: Rafting
text: This year, we've added a new amazing experience: rafting on the Noce River in the magnificient Val di Sole.

title: Wellness
text: Our ***s hotel offers a comfrotable SPA which will help restore your physical and spiritual balance.

title: Amazing traditional food
text: Enjoy 3 days of authentic italian mountain food, straight from ancient, simpler times.

title: Professional alpine guides
text: We will be joined by professional, licensed alpine guides and mountaineers.

title: Invite only
text: The event is invite-only and you will spend time with like-minded but diverse and extremely impressive people.
